## Vector

<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OZg8rvl0Vwk>

## Providing logo

CYMK color
Font : convert, type > create outlines, non editable non font-embedded file.


## size
size: 1280 pixels largest side

## save Master board file .ai
Group logo
Create artboard over the logo.
Name the artboard.
Save this as master file.ai
Also save as master.eps

## Export
Export for screens, each logo file:
PNG
PDF
SVG
